::: {.callout-tip}
## Learning outcomes

-   Understand that odds ratios and risk ratios are effect sizes in the context of binomial response variables
-   Know the difference between odds ratios, risk ratios and relative risk
-   Be able to calculate and interpret appropriate effect sizes for logistic regression
:::
